episodes.title: March 6, 2017 - Smoked ESB

episodes.summary: Steve adds a bit of beechwood smoked malt to a traditional English style to bring a little campfire to the party.

episodes.title: January 6, 2017 - Plain, Coconut, and Mole Porters

episodes.title: August 11, 2016 - Sous Vide Steak and Hoppy Cyser
episodes.author: James Spencer

tags: beer brew brewing homebrew homebrewing hobby hobbies food

episodes.title: July 25, 2016 - 100% Rye Tart Hoppy Ale

episodes.summary: Steve helps James sample two English-inspired session beers brewed with malted rye to maintain mouthfeel while reducing alcohol.

episodes.title: March 7, 2016 - Homemade Crystal Malt

episodes.title: 10-18-06 Basic Brewing Video - At Home with Charlie Papazian
episodes.author: James Spencer
episodes.summary: Homebrewing guru Charlie Papazian shows us around his home brewery. Then, we sit down to sip a couple of homebrews and chat about homebrewing and beer in general.
tags: beer brew brewing homebrew homebrewing hobby hobbies food

episodes.title: 10-04-06 Basic Brewing Video - Great American Beer Festival
episodes.author: James Spencer
episodes.summary: We travel to Denver to sample the goodness of the 25th Great American Beer Festival. Almost 400 brewers, more than 1600 beers, and three happy podcasters.
tags: beer brew brewing homebrew homebrewing hobby hobbies food

episodes.title: 09-12-06 Basic Brewing Video - Brewing Beer with Honey
episodes.author: James Spencer

tags: beer brew brewing homebrew homebrewing hobby hobbies food

episodes.title: 08-31-06 Basic Brewing Video - Homegrown Hops and Harvest Ale

episodes.title: 08-07-06 Basic Brewing Video - Beer for Dessert!
episodes.author: James Spencer
episodes.summary: Beer's not just for breakfast anymore. Following Randy Mosher's advice, James and Steve pair up four beers with the sweet stuff, and Steve shows us his take on a New Orleans favorite.

episodes.title: 07-18-06 Basic Brewing Video - Club Night at NHC 2006

episodes.title: 07-11-06 Basic Brewing Video - Pro Brewers Night at NHC 2006

episodes.author: James Spencer
